question: [File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-localnet/src/health_checker.rs] [Serialize trait] [Serialization Side Effects] At line 23, does deriving Serialize for HealthChecker safely handle sensitive data in connection strings and URLs, or does it leak credentials? (High)
